item.title: Russian Lives (The Russians & Living in Russia)
item.description: The Russians 2 x For the German broadcaster DW, Juri Rescheto ( Twitter, profile) traveled through Russia to create the documentary described above. The lives of ordinary Russians, in two parts, titled The Russians â€“ an intimate journey through Russia (2020, 2 x 42 m).
